entries.femaleVariant: <mothertongue l="mex" m="chica" b="'Bout time, " a="!"/>
How's Mama Welles?
You look tense, exhausted.
What's new with Señora Welles?
Look like you just ran a marathon. Somethin' happen?
This is it – the major leagues.
Wouldn't be here if not for Dex.
We have arrived – the major leagues.
We're only here 'cause Dex is pullin' the strings.
Place used to be a morgue – you believe that?
Who woulda thunk…
It's really startin' to wear on me. More I tell her everythin's OK, more I feel like I'm straight-up lyin'.
Oh, but we are. They just don't know it yet.
I know, right? Way before our time, that. When proper burials were still a thing.
But that's done after tomorrow. Afterlife, here we come, baby! Yeah!
Ready to get your cherry popped? Yeeeah! Come on!
Does not get any higher, choom.
The fuck you talkin' about, Squama? Whaddaya mean he didn't work when he fuckin' worked his ass hard.
Saw some old pictures of the Water Leopards. Damn Petrochem logo everywhere.
I take corpo gigs just like your old man did. What's the difference?
The difference is that Boa Boa had balls. Enough to stand up to the corps and call the shots on his own ops.
He also knew the difference between cooperatin' and servin'.
Dropped us at Kang Tao's seaside resort in Cape Town.
Right hook's fuckin' killer, but he's just too slow to reel it back into guard.
Murdock pops jabs left 'n right, and if he throws in an uppercut and gets it to land… that's the bell right there.
So what, just not likely, guy's got lousy footwork.
Best leave ever. Joytoys from every corner of the planet, neverending booze, mountains of the purest synth-blow!
Sounds whoa-wild. But then how come you didn't re-enlist for a fourth tour?
Lo and behold, every gonk I meet's friendly, helpful. After what we did – can you believe that? Some lady asked me to buy her arm off of her.
Her arm?
This again… Remember what happened when you and Price sparred, remember?
I'm hella faster than that. I'd just had fresh kneecaps put in. Just never got a chance to break 'em in.
Bullshit. Your footwork's as lousy as Murdock's.
What can I getcha?
Steep price to pay for a drink.
What do you have to do to get your own drink?
Guess there's no such thing as living legends.
Steep price to pay.
Say I wanted a drink named after me – what would I have to do?
Who else can I drink here?
In mind-blowingly spectacular fashion. Mid-op'd be best.
All on the menu…
Heh, 's true. Morgan's yet to make up his mind if he's dead or still kickin'.
Why not? Look at Rogue. Peeps from that era – a species unto themselves.
Aah, what a beaut of a TRADITION!
Guess dyin's a small price to pay for goin' down in history.
Gotta live like a legend first, though, eh?
Hey, everyone's gotta go sometime, right? Why not in style?
Oh, and by the way, name's Jackie Welles. You wanna write down my recipe?
Hmm... sure.
Went into town once. A little jittery 'cause we'd dropped a few tons of ordnance on their heads a few days earlier.
Snuff it.
Name's V, this is Jackie Welles.
Friends of Dexter DeShawn.
Name's V, this is Jackie Welles.
Oh, is that supposed to sound familiar?
It will soon. We're here to see Dex.
We're friends of Dexter DeShawn. He's expectin' us.
An' who might you clowns be?
Yeah? All right, then.
Can you imagine? Susan Forrest, Boa Boa, maybe even Morgan Blackhand…
[Sit] We're up.
'Ey. See that old lady there?
That's Rogue – best fixer in all o' Night City.
Thought Dex was the best.
Pff... Rogue was linin' up jobs when Dex was still shittin' in diapers, heh. Place belongs to her.
[Sit]
Mr. DeShawn see you now.
This way.
How'd you know?
My job to know.
Mr. DeShawn ready. Where your friend go?
She'll be back in a sec, don't worry.
entries.maleVariant: Hey, he'll be back in a sec, don't worry.

entries.femaleVariant: Mr. DeShawn no like wait.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="¿Que no?" b="Yeah, neither does Mr. Welles, heheh. But sometimes you gotta, holmes. " a=""/>
[Stand]
Break a leg.
Thanks.
<kiroshi l="mex" o="No." t="No." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="mex" o="¡Porque ya tengo planes para esta noche!" t="Because I already got plans for tonight!" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="mex" o="¡Virgen Santísima, ma! ¡Te vas a enterar mañana!" t="For the love of Christ, Ma! You'll find out tomorrow!" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="mex" o="Yo también te quiero, ma." t="Love you too, Ma." b="" a=""/>
Really, Jackie?
What?
Told you that myself.
Oh, for reals? Ah, shit, er… must've been ages ago.
Doesn't look like all it's bigged up to be.
Funny...
It's what's inside that counts, choom.
Tellin' ya, it's not gonna work.
Rogue told me you're the one to talk to.
Relax, it's taken care of, we're set. Now, about the eddies. Who's payin', exactly?
Yo, Dex. Got two live ones sayin' they're here to see ya.
Says he needs a second or two. Go get yourselves drinks or somethin'.
Heard you were Dex's latest finds.
You order.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="cerveza" b="Two Tequila Old Fashioneds with a splash of " a=" and a chili garnish."/>
A duo of Johnny Silverhands, comin' up.
You pick for me.
Nothing for me.
I'm good, thanks.
For real? I'm celebratin'! C'mon, it's on me!
<mothertongue l="mex" m="chica" b="Right on, " a="."/>
Age-old tradition. Drinks're named after our regulars.
One Johnny Silverhand, comin' up.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="cerveza" b="A Tequila Old Fashioned with a splash of " a=" and a chili garnish."/>
I'm good, thanks.
Nothing for me.
What'll it be?
I'll have the same.
I'll have what he's havin'.
Just biz, no big deal.
Look around – how do you think mercs earn their reps? Through gossip rivaling that of schoolgirls, that's how.
Brand new Kendachi, y'know, army surplus as compensation. Heh, fields were burning, people were starving to death, and we gave 'em chrome arms…
No, no, it's not about the fucking color or max altitude.
Why didn't you order it from Germany like I told you to?
Doe'n't matter. I'll wait.
Puttin' payment on hold for now, though.
Because I want what I fuckin' chose. Nothing else.
6th Street. Why?
Nothin', nothin'… Just that I'm runnin' up some pretty steep expenses.
I've dealt with 6th Street before. We do the run, they'll transfer the cred.
'Course, yeah. I'm sure it'll work out.
[Drink] To Night City!
And the Afterlife! Hahaaa!
To Night City!
What?
For a club with the hottest contracts in town, doesn't look like all it's bigged up to be.
Doubt that puts us in the same league as them.
Show of force. Not terribly subtle, either. Wanna show everyone who's boss.
Old man Arasaka might as well've walked into Myers' office naked, waving is half-shriveled dick around.
Not gonna start a war with one stupid aircraft carrier, though…
No, they wanna remind Militech they've got a hundred more in Japan. Pacific ain't the level playin' field it used to be.
Saburo Arasaka's not gonna pick another fight with Militech.
How do you know? He tell you personally? Hm?
Think this might be the oldest club in Night City.
How long's the Afterlife been around? Half a century?
Longer. Don't know by how much, though.
Gotta be the oldest club in Night City.
And the most respected. Don't forget that bit.
How'd you know?
Ehhh, y'know. She's worried about me – whatever.
Years of mercwork, and yet – still sweat like a roasted pig when I talk to my ma.
Huh, nobody knows what happened to him… Think he's still alive? It's been years…
To bein' filthy rich!
To hittin' the major leagues!
[Drink] To getting filthy rich!
[Drink] To the heist of a lifetime!
Filthy rich legends!
Heheh, I'll drink to that!
Gonna have a drink or not?
This is it...
Is Dex a regular?
Dex a regular? He come here a lot?
Had a sorta long hiatus, matter of fact. Didn't show his face for nearly two years.
Damn, holmes, you're huge... Work out?
So, what would ya say's changed the most?
Hm. When I was leavin', this was a huge construction site.
Now you can smell the eddies lying in the street, ripe for pickin'.
Among all the trash and human shit.
Heh. Used to have a buddy, worked sanitation – in the city sewers.
Asked him once why he did what he did, woke up every morning and went off to work. Know what he told me?
No, what?
"I'd rather be knee-deep in real shit than the shit you have to wade through to pay your rent."
Same here, y'know, in the ring. You do some kinda exotic shit? Kempo? Ninjitsu?
Think you could take me, drop me?
<kiroshi l="mex" o="Este pinche tipo..." t="This fuckin' guy..." b="" a=""/>
In here.
Tomcat's gotta walk his own path, right?
Yeah, well, wherever he walked, he knocked a few pounds off.
Wanna get in.
Can I get through?
Booth's occupied. Permanently. So run along.
Hey.
Grab a seat. Be with you in a sec.
You again? Whaddaya want?
Uh, can I get through...?
Can I get in?
The Afterlife... known far and wide, that name.
Can't help herself, y'know – checkin' to see if I'm not rottin' in some dumpster... like most of the Welles boys.
Some of the nomad clans' biggest jobs were scored right here.
Don't surprise me. Ain't no better place in Night City to land a gig.
Shot of vodka on the rocks, lime juice, ginger beer... oh, and most importantly – a splash of love.
Haha, I'll remember that.
Hey.
Death... s'nothin' but the final flourish.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="viejo." b="Way ahead o' you, " a=""/>
All sat on those stools, fell asleep on that same bar.
Somebody did their homework.
Looks like the dog ate mine...
The heart o' Night City!
That's it right there – beating. Hear it?
Who else can I drink?
'Cept there's a spot missing. Morgan Blackhand, right?
And you know somethin' else?
<mothertongue l="mex" m="chica" b="We fuckin' earned it, " a="."/>
entries.maleVariant: <mothertongue l="mex" m="mano" b="We fuckin' earned it, " a="."/>

entries.femaleVariant: Oh yeah?
[Drink] To this!
To this!
<mothertongue l="mex" m="Chingada madre..." b="" a=" Fine, have it your way!"/>
'Fraid it's out of your league, friend.
You deaf? Get gone.
Nope. Forget it.
Referral?
Uhh... what?
Just as I thought. Keep walkin'.
Mh.
Mh.
Sure.
Looks like we're up.
Guess they weren't deliverin' that pizza I mentioned before...
Who else got honored in that way?
The Afterlife's known far and wide.
Bad time to choke and shit your britches, choom. C'mooon.
Love to hang, imbibe the vibe, but we got an important meeting.
You have problem with something? Come on, we go.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="Chingada madre..." b="" a=" Fine, have it your way!"/>
